name: It Could Be You
description:
This is a game about the reality of losing your job in 21st century Britain. Will you apply for benefits? Borrow from your family? Approach a loan shark?

It could happen to anyone.

Made on Twine by Shirley and Tom.

Shirley also paints game art for charity on her website here:

http://canvasandpaints.blogspot.co.uk/p/oxfam-paintings.html
